sentence.Network_en: The sunniest place is in Yuma, Arizona, in the United States.
sentence.Network_cn: 阳光最充足的地方是在美国亚利桑那州的宇马.

sentence.Network_en: He was said to have served time at Yuma Prison.
sentence.Network_cn: 据说,他在尤马监狱服刑.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the North American Indian people of Arizona and adjacent Mexico and California
2. a town in southwestern Arizona on the Colorado River and the California border
3. the Yuman language spoken by the Yuma people
